backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and visitor record CRUD operations with sorting and export support.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types and a simple pass-through migration function for upgrading stored user profiles and visitor records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files and components to the requirement ensuring admin views use server-stored visitor data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point containing the root element and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up theming, query client, and rendering the VisitorTracker with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminLogin.tsx: Dialog component handling admin password submission with validation, errors, and controlled visibility.
frontend/src/components/VisitorForm.tsx: Form component for creating visitor records with validation and submission via addVisitorRecord mutation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTable.tsx: Table component displaying visitor records with optional admin editing and update logic driven by mutations.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTracker.t: Main visitor tracker UI component handling admin mode, record fetching, and CSV/XLSX export actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMode.ts: Provides simple admin mode state with session persistence and password-based unlock/lock functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and exporting visitor records through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and global light/dark theme styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/utils/exportToCSV.ts: Converts visitor records to CSV format, escapes values, and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXLSX.ts: Dynamically loads SheetJS to generate an Excel file from visitor records with formatted columns.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting mixed routing setups.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed UI including container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s shared visitor‑tracking tool, its admin rules, architecture notes, and the list of implemented features with versions.
